      • execute

        void execute(sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events.guild.channel.message.MessageReceivedEvent event,
             java.lang.String[] args)
      throws MissingRequirementsException,
             MissingArgumentsException
        Processes the command issued.
        Parameters:
        event - the even object contains the IMessage, sender (IUser), IChannel, IGuild, IShard, and IDiscordClient.
        args - the command's arguments.
        Throws:
        MissingArgumentsException - the arguments passed were invalid or missing.
        MissingRequirementsException - the command was block due to some missing requirement.
